task.title: Adding an Address
task.shortdesc: Add a new address to your student records through the MyPack Portal.

taskbody.prereq: You must have an active NC State Unity account and be logged into MyPack Portal.
taskbody.context: This process is necessary when you need to provide a new address for mailing, emergency contact, or diploma delivery purposes.

step.cmd: Log into your MyPack Portal using your NC State Unity account.
From the left-hand navigation menu, select "Addresses."
Under the appropriate header, such as 'Diploma Address,' if no address is defined, click the 'Add Diploma Address' button.
Choose to either select the 'Copy From' button to copy an address already on record, or manually enter an address in the provided fields.
Click the green 'Save' button to save your new address.

taskbody.result: After completing these steps, the new address will be added to your student records.
